titleStmt.title: [Receipt] 1823 Apr. 10, Nashville, Tennessee [to] William Fitzgerald / Thomas Crutcher : a machine readable transcription of an image
titleStmt.author: Crutcher, Thomas

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Receipt] 1823 Apr. 10, Nashville, Tennessee [to] William Fitzgerald / Thomas Crutcher
bibl.author: Crutcher, Thomas
bibl.note: This is a one page receipt for the payment of Tennessee state tax collected by William Fitzgerald dated April 10, 1823 to Thomas Crutcher.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p: Received of William Fitzgerald, clerk of the circuit court of Stuart county Seventeen dollars, Being the amount of state tax by him collected for the year ending the first day of October eighteen hundred and twenty two which he is by law bound to acct account . for agreeably to his return this day rendered for said year 1822 $17

closer.add:
Treasurer of West Tennessee There has no return for the year 1821 If Mr Mister
John Allen does not send a return before the rise of Davidson circuit court I shall have a judgt judgement against him and send Execution immediately Your
Tho Thomas Crutchers
